member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.ParserGen.InputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the source .PSI file.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.ParserGen.OutputFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the folder into which the files should be generated.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.RemoveItemsInFolder
member.summary: Scans through the item group and removes any items that fall under the given folder.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.RemoveItemsInFolder.Execute
member.summary: The method to be overriden in inheriting tasks. Throw an exception in case of an errror.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.RemoveItemsInFolder.Directory
member.summary: Specifies the directory files in which (recursively) should be excluded from .

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.PsiGen.Targets.RemoveItemsInFolder.Items
member.summary: Specifies the list of the files to be filtered down. Note: you should not be using the same item group for input and output, as the output contributes to the item group but would not replace it.
